property.name: _windowProperties
property.value: {bounds={0, 22, 1311, 698}, maximized=false}

property.name: text
property.value:
Test for WebServer application path without slash app
and various servlet paths with and without slashes servlet1, /servlet2, servlet3/, servlet4/*, /servlet5/, /servlet6/*, and the default /*
Note that if the servlet path has a trailing slash but no star following, the URL must include the trailing slash, e.g. http://localhost:8078/app/servlet3/

property.name: text
property.value: DE director: stopWhenQueueIsEmpty false synchronizedToRealTime true
